title: Narrow plots in residential and commercial zones,viz those less than 15 m wide or deep will be permitted the relaxation shown in column 3 of Table No 19 hereunder subject to the restrictions in column 4 thereof
clause_text: Narrow plots in residential and commercial zones,viz those less than 15 m wide or deep will be permitted the relaxation shown in column 3 of Table No 19 hereunder subject to the restrictions in column 4 thereof. Open Space Relaxation in Narrow plots in Residential and Commercial Zones. No dimension of any building in a narrow plot shall exceed 30 m.
section: Provisions regarding relaxation in open spaces in narrow plots-
